verses.verse: I will sing <WH7891> of mercy <WH2617> and judgment <WH4941>: unto you <WH3068>, O Lord, will I sing <WH2167>.

I will behave myself wisely <WH7919> in a perfect <WH8549> way <WH1870>. O when will you come <WH935> unto me <WH1980>? I will walk inside <WH7130> my house <WH1004> with a perfect <WH8537> heart <WH3824>.
I will set <WH7896> no wicked <WH1100> thing <WH1697> before my eyes <WH5869>: I hate <WH8130> the work <WH6213> of them that turn aside <WH7750>; it shall not cleave to me <WH1692>.
A perverse <WH6141> heart <WH3824> shall depart <WH5493> from me <WH3045>: I will not know a wicked person <WH7451>.

Whoever privately <WH5643> slanders <WH3960> his neighbor <WH7453>, him will I cut off <WH6789>: him that has a high <WH1362> look <WH5869> and a proud <WH7342> heart <WH3824> will not I allow <WH3201>.
My eyes <WH5869> shall be upon the faithful <WH539> of the land <WH776>, that they may live <WH3427> with me <WH1980>: he that walks in a perfect <WH8549> way <WH1870>, he shall serve me <WH8334>.
He that works <WH6213> deceit <WH7423> shall not live <WH3427> inside <WH7130> my house <WH1004>: he that tells <WH1696> lies <WH8267> shall not stay <WH3559> in my sight <WH5869>.
I will early <WH1242> destroy <WH6789> all the wicked <WH7563> of the land <WH776>; that I may cut off <WH3772> all wicked <WH205> doers <WH6466> from the city <WH5892> of the Lord <WH3068>.
